projects: [{"title":"Design and Computational Flow Analysis of a Transonic Axial Compressor | Aircraft Propulsion","start_date":"May 2017","description":" Designing a compressor for tolerance against flow non uniformity towards small engine application Optimizing the design through iterative CAD of Compressor blades and CFD flow analysis of compressor"},{"title":"Damage Detection Using Artificial Neutral Network and Orthogonal Matching Pursuit | Aerospace Structures","start_date":"Jul 2015","end_date":"May 2016","description":" Implemented ANN scheme for the automation of damage detection for Structural Health Monitoring Applied OMP algorithm for the sparse approximation of database consisting of 20k datasets of wave signals Achieved a database sparsity of 75% using the Orthogonal Matching Pursuit algorithm"},{"title":"Dynamics of Viscoelastic Materials","start_date":"Jan 2015","end_date":"May 2015","description":"Mathematical Modelling of harmonic response of Viscoelastic rotational and translational systems."},{"title":"IITB Mars Rover Team, MSI","start_date":"May 2013","end_date":"May 2015"},{},{},{},{},{},{},{}]
